hero.title: Transforming Concepts into Seamless User Experience
hero.subtitle: I'm Yamine Daroueche, a French front-end Web developer.

about.title: About me
about.subtitle:
I'm an enthusiastic web developer, motivated and determined to bring value to the people I work with.

Currently studying Computer Science in a Bachelor's Degree at the University of Limoges, I decided to specialise myself in JavaScript Web development.

Sportify.title: Sportify
Sportify.description:
Scenario (fictional): Sportify is a gym in Limoges with several locations, where different courses (pilates, cycling, etc.) are available for the public.

This project was coded in pure PHP (without Framework). I used the MVC (Model-View-Controller) architecture for better code organization.

Blog.title: My blog
Blog.description:
I'm currently working on a blog, where I will share my learning journey in Web development. I will also write on other subjects.

Work in progress...
